Install Jekyll

Mar 28, 2015 •

Install Jekyll

gem install Jekyll

Move into the folder that you want to install Jekyll

  1. Open up the terminal
  2. If you aren’t a terminal jockey, then do the the following: type cd and then drag the folder on to the terminal. Hit return.

Create your new site

in my case, jekyll new lifeceo

Fire up your new site!

cd into lifeceo http://127.0.0.1:4000/
